tool_description: Give you a random US phone number in Textnow so you can use it for a day.
name: Textnow one day (Phone US)
title: Textnow one day (Phone US)

api_list.name: Get Phone Number
api_list.description: Get a random US phone number in Textnow.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://textnow-one-day-phone-us.p.rapidapi.com/?query=get_phone_number"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "textnow-one-day-phone-us.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://textnow-one-day-phone-us.p.rapidapi.com/?query=get_phone_number"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "textnow-one-day-phone-us.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
